divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my apartment balcony on the third floor watching for meteorites at about 1:30 am when I observed a unusual craft moving too fast to be any commercial airliner. I first thought it was a slow moving meteor. I estimated the speed to be around Mach 1, since I have seen many fighter jets, but the object was completely silent and did not emit any sound consistant with commercial or military aircraft. My residence is by a small airport, but the object traversed an area directly over my head to the horizon in about 15-20 sec, which is almost impossible for a civilian aircraft, and a fighter would probably have to be in afterburner. The object had flickering lights underneath that blinked in rapid succession and were blue, red, and white. The object was about 300 feet long and diamond shaped.
Summary: Fast moving, silent, elongated diamond with rapidly blinking lights underneath
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in East Lansing
There were no other sightings in East Lansing on or around August 23rd 2008
